message.nexus.unlock_dimension: You can now travel to this dimension from The Nexus.
message.nexus.invalid_dimension: Destination dimension could not be found!
message.nexus.invalid_destination: Destination is outside the world border for that dimension! Removing invalid link...
message.nexus.no_core: Destination Nexus Portal Core could not be found! Removing invalid link...
message.nexus.no_link: Destination Nexus Portal Core is not linked to this one! Removing invalid link...
message.nexus.teleport.locked_dimension: You can't travel to this dimension. You haven't been there before!
message.nexus.generate_link.no_core: You do not have a Nexus Portal Core in your main-hand!
message.nexus.generate_link.no_valid_spa: Could not find suitable y-level to generate Destination Nexus Portal Core!
message.nexus.find_link.searching: Searching for similar Nexus Portal Core...
message.nexus.find_link.success: Found similar Nexus Portal Core and successfully linked to it!
message.nexus.find_link.failure: Could not find similar Nexus Portal Core!
screen.nexus.nexus_portal_core.title: Nexus Portal Core
screen.nexus.nexus_portal_core.button.di: You can only change Target Dimension from The Nexus.
screen.nexus.nexus_portal_core.button.fi: Searches for another core in the target dimension.
screen.nexus.nexus_portal_core.button.ge: Creates a new link to the target dimension.
screen.nexus.nexus_portal_core.button.un: Hold shift to take the linked Nexus Portal Core.
networking.nexus.unlocked_dimension_list: Failed to synchronize unlocked dimension list! %s
description.nexus.chrono_upgrade_smithin: Used to craft Chrono Shards. Found in Trial Chamber Chest & Vaults.
description.nexus.chrono_shard: Used to craft Nexus Portal Cores.
description.nexus.nexus_portal_core: Allows traversal to The Nexus. Each portal core has its own coordinate scale. The blocks traveled in The Nexus are multiplied by this scale when leaving the dimension. You can use it in an Anvil to give your portal a name when placed. You can also disguise this block as another by using with a held block.
